snippet.title: Beasts and bumpkins
snippet.description:
Beasts & Bumpkins was developed by Worldweaver Productions Ltd and published by Electronic Arts, Inc for Windows in 1997. 

Beasts and Bumpkins is a real time strategy game, with gameplay which can be compared to Warcraft. Your task is to complete over 30 missions in order to regain your former reputation. You´ll have to set up prospering towns in order to gain wealth, which is required to supply an army. With your army, you´ll have to defend your villages against beasts and other evil folks.

This game ran fine in Windows 7 using Windows 95 compatability. The trick to actually making it run without errors was to first use Windows 95 compat on the setup-file as well. There are some color distortions but nothing game-breaking.
